content: the stitch and bind off the begin working the main pattern for the stitch on the right-hand needle poncho changing to longer length circulars as to work the poncho in smaller or larger the stitches become crowded on the shorter sizes cast on fewer or more stitches in lengths multiples of 4 place increase line markers at the 25% stitch count and at the 75% stitch round a knit count example if you are casting on 40 round b knit to two stitches before the stitches place the increase line markers at increase line marker kfb k1 sm kfb knit to two 10th and 30th stitches purl 10 pm purl 20 stitches before the next increase line marker pm purl 10 kfb k1 sm kfb knit to the end of the round 4 stitches increased repeat rounds a & b until piece measures about 14 15 16 17 measured straight down the side do not measure along the increase line bottom border round c purl round d repeat round b from main pattern above repeat rounds c & d until border measures 1 abbreviations purl one round bind off knitwise on the next round increasing one stitch next to each k knit marker as you bind off see note on page 2 to kfb knit into the front and back of the stitch maintain a pointy edge one stitch increased p purl finishing pm place marker weave in tails and block sm slip marker 2 | bas ic child ren s po nc ho ©2015 2020 shaina bilow designs www shainabilow com please share your finished projects on ravelry facebook @shaina bilow designs and instagram @shaina bilow
